class bubble_trouble_ai_competition.base_objects.base_player.BasePlayer(name: str, direction: Directions, events_observable: EventsObservable, position: tuple = (20, 0), dimensions: tuple = (30, 100))

Bases: object

Base class to create an AI playing the game.

name (str): The name of the player. direction (Directions): The direction the player is facing.
